title: Read These Banned Books: A Journal and 52-Week Reading Challenge from the American Library Association
description: From the American Library Association comes a must-read challenge for book lovers and literary activists to explore! Formatted as an interactive recommended reading list from ALA, this one-year challenge tasks readers with a new read each week, all banned or challenged book from yesterday and today. The perfect gift for all bibliophiles and social justice activists, this journal is far more than a simple list of reads. Each week, readers will find a recommended title with a write up and review from the ALA as to why the book was censored. These titles span categories, from fantasy and graphic novel to nonfiction and romance, but are all were challenged or banned at some point in history. Published in partnership with Sourcebooks.
author: American Library Association
